metadata.title: CVE-2024-23313 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An integer underflow vulnerability exists in the sopen_FAMOS_readfunctionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and Master Branch(ab0ee111). A specially crafted .famos file can lead to an out-of-boundswrite which in turn can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
